verses.verse: Then we <S%H6437>turned<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>: and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H5971>us<s%>, he and all his people, unto <S%H4421>battle<s%> at <S%H154>Edrei<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3372>me<s%>, Fear him <S%H5414>not<s%>; for I have delivered <S%H5971>him<s%>, and all his people, and his <S%H776>land<s%>, into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> unto him as thou <S%H6213>didst<s%> unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>.

So <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into our <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>also<s%>, the king of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>: and we <S%H5221>smote<s%> him until none was <S%H7604>left<s%> to him <S%H8300>remaining<s%>.

And we <S%H3920>took<s%> all his <S%H5892>cities<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>; there was not a <S%H7151>city<s%> which we <S%H3947>took<s%> not from <S%H8346>them<s%>; threescore <S%H5892>cities<s%>, all the <S%H2256>region<s%> of <S%H709>Argob<s%>, the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

All these were <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H1219>fortified<s%> with <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2346>walls<s%>, <S%H1817>gates<s%>, and <S%H1280>bars<s%>; besides the <S%H6521>unwalled<s%> <S%H5892>towns<s%> a <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%>.

And we utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H6213>them<s%>, as we did unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, utterly <S%H2763>destroying<s%> every <S%H4962>inhabited<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, with the <S%H802>women<s%> and the little <S%H2945>ones<s%>.
But all the <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%>, we took for a prey unto <S%H962>ourselves<s%>.

And we <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H3947>out<s%> of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> that were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, from the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>;
<S%H2768><s%>( which Hermon the <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H8303>Sirion<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> it <S%H8149>Senir<s%>;)

all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4334>plain<s%>, and all <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and all <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, unto <S%H5548>Salecah<s%> and <S%H154>Edrei<s%>, <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

(For only <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> <S%H7604>remained<s%> of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>; <S%H6210>behold<s%>, his bedstead was a <S%H6210>bedstead<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>; is it <S%H3808>not<s%> in <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>? <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H702>thereof<s%>, and four <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H520>it<s%>, after the cubit of a <S%H376>man<s%>.)

And this <S%H776>land<s%> we took in <S%H3423>possession<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>: from <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, which is by the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5414>thereof<s%>, gave I unto the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and to the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>:

and the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and all <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%>, <S%H5414>gave<s%> I unto the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>; all the <S%H2256>region<s%> of <S%H709>Argob<s%>, even all <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>. (The <S%H1931>same<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>.

Jair <S%H2971><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H2256>region<s%> of <S%H709>Argob<s%>, unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> and the <S%H4602>Maacathites<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1316>them<s%>, even Bashan, after his own <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H3117>Havvoth-jair<s%>, unto this day.)
And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> unto <S%H4353>Machir<s%>.

And unto the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and unto the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> from <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> even unto the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%>, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5158>thereof<s%>, even unto the river <S%H2999>Jabbok<s%>, which is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>;

the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> <S%H3383>also<s%>, and the Jordan and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H3672>thereof<s%>, from Chinnereth even unto the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%>, the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>, under the slopes of <S%H798>Pisgah<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>.

And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> you this <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H5674>it<s%>: ye shall pass over <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, all the <S%H1121>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>.

But your <S%H802>wives<s%>, and your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and your <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, (I <S%H3045>know<s%> that ye have <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4735>cattle<s%>,) shall <S%H3427>abide<s%> in your <S%H5892>cities<s%> which I have given <S%H5414>you<s%>,

until <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> give <S%H5117>rest<s%> unto your <S%H251>brethren<s%>, as unto <S%H3423>you<s%>, and they also possess the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> them <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>: then shall ye <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H3425>possession<s%>, which I have given <S%H5414>you<s%>.

And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> unto these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%>: so shall <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> whither thou goest <S%H5674>over<s%>.
Ye shall not <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>; for Jehovah your <S%H430>God<s%>, he it is that fighteth for <S%H3898>you<s%>.
And I <S%H2603>besought<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, thou hast <S%H2490>begun<s%> to <S%H7200>show<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> thy <S%H1433>greatness<s%>, and thy <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>: for what <S%H410>god<s%> is there in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> or in <S%H776>earth<s%>, that can <S%H6213>do<s%> according to thy <S%H4639>works<s%>, and according to thy mighty <S%H1369>acts<s%>?

Let me go <S%H5674>over<s%>, I pray <S%H7200>thee<s%>, and see the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> that is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, that <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>.

But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H5674>wroth<s%> with me for your <S%H8085>sakes<s%>, and hearkened not unto <S%H3068>me<s%>; and Jehovah <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7227>me<s%>, Let it suffice <S%H1696>thee<s%>; speak no <S%H3254>more<s%> unto me of this <S%H1697>matter<s%>.

Get thee <S%H5927>up<s%> unto the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah<s%>, and lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>, and <S%H6828>northward<s%>, and <S%H8486>southward<s%>, and <S%H4217>eastward<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> with thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: for thou shalt not go <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

But <S%H6680>charge<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and <S%H2388>encourage<s%> <S%H553>him<s%>, and strengthen <S%H5674>him<s%>; for he shall go over <S%H6440>before<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>, and he shall cause them to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%>.
So we <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H1047>Beth-peor<s%>.
